{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Linksys MR7350 01.jpeg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Max-Stream Mesh WiFi 6 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR7350/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Linksys_MR7350 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = MR7350 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-08151 |icid = 3839A-08151 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = EWW610-A1-BL-015 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ6028; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.8 GHz 1.8 GHz (+ 2x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30UF2G18AC-XKI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W634GU6NB-11; |ram1_num = <!-- 1/2 --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 12-pin header,, |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, EJTAG
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, DBDC, DFS, HE80, VHT80, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85340-11;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85755-11;;2; ,,, PMIC;MPS;MP5496;MPSK04, MP5496, 74S827;1; <!-- MPS - Monolithic Power Systems --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb <!-- (Belkin) --> |manuf_model = EWW610 |manuf_rev = -A1-BL-015 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/31/2020 |estreldate = 06/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5022; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5052; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "EWW610-A1-BL-015" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*[[Linksys MR7350]] (AX1800) - Max-Stream Mesh WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR7350/ PPage] :FCC ID: Q87-08151 (2020-03-31) • Dual-Band 802.11ax Wireless Router :''See also [http://www.bitswrt.com/nhx6018.html BitsWRT NHX6018]''
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-networking-pro-400-platform IPQ6028] @1.8GHz :Pro 400: Quad-core (ARM Cortex-A53) *Flash: 32MB (NOR)/256MB (NAND) *RAM: 512MB SDRAM (DDR3L) *WiFi: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5022/QCN5052 :Wi-Fi 6 - 802.11ax 2T2R (AX1800) *PMIC: ''Monolithic Power Systems'' MP5496 *WAN: 1x 1GbE, LAN: 4x 1GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port; PSU: 12V/2A
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== *[[Linksys MR7350]] (AX1800) - Max-Stream Mesh WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR7350/ PPage] :FCC ID: Q87-08151 (2020-03-31) • Dual-Band 802.11ax Wireless Router *[[Linksys MR7500]] (MR75WH) - AXE6600 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Mesh Router :WFA ID: WFA111136 (2021-03-16) • Wi-Fi 6E 802.11ax (2.4/5/6GHz) <!-- Linux 4.4.60 --> *[[Linksys MR8300]] (AC2200) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 5 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR8300/ PPage] *[[Linksys MR9000]] (AC3000) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 5 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR9000/ PPage] *[[Linksys MR9600]] (AX6000) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR9600/ PPage]
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Linksys MR7350 01.jpeg| File:Linksys MR7350 02.jpeg| File:Linksys MR7350 03.jpeg| File:Linksys MR7350 04.jpeg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== :;[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[Linksys]] • [https://www.linksys.com/us/c/wireless-routers/ Wireless Routers] *[[Linksys AXE8400]] (AX8400) • CES2021 ($450/$850/$1200) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/01/12/linksys-axe8400-is-the-worlds-first-wifi-6e-router/ Review] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-networking-pro-1210-platform ''Networking Pro 1210''] Quad-core (ARM-Cortex A53) <!-- :System Memory: TBD DDR3/DDR4 (1GB ?); Storage: TBD (256MB ?) :Connectivity: 1x WAN (5GbE), 4x LAN (1GbE) Gigabit Ethernet ports :Wi-Fi: Tri-band: 4.8Gbps (6GHz), 2.4Gbps (5GHz), 1.2Gbps (2.4GHz) :Wi-Fi 6E (6GHz) with 14x 80MHz channels / 7x 160MHz channels :Wi-Fi 6 (2.4GHz/5GHz), 802.11ac (Wave 2), 802.11n, 802.11a/b/g :WiFi clients: up to 64 clients; USB: 1x USB 3.0 ports --> *[[Linksys E8450]] (AX3200) - AX3200 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router • [https://www.acwifi.net/12316.html Review] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7622/MT7615N/MT7915A (MT7911AN/MT7975AN) :Wi-Fi: 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 2400Mbps (5GHz); WAN/LAN: 1x/4x (1GbE)
*[[Linksys MX8500]] (MX85EC, MX85MS, MX85WH) - Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router :WFA ID: WFA109988 (2021-01-14) • Wi-Fi 6E 802.11ax (2.4/5/6GHz) *[[Linksys MX5300]] (AX3600) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A (4x 2.2GHz) • [https://www.acwifi.net/10155.html TD] *[[Linksys MX4200]] (AX2600) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8174 (4x 1.4GHz)
